thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil made for Bayern Munich tie – Michael Ballack | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil made for Bayern Munich tie – Michael Ballack | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 5:42 pm Should Ozil start? (Picture: Getty) 
Chelsea legend Michael Ballack is adamant Mesut Ozil should start for Arsenal against Bayern Munich and believes the best players will always shine on the biggest stage. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The attacking midfielder has come in for criticism in recent weeks after a series of lacklustre performances and it’s believed that Arsene Wenger is seriously considering dropping him for the away leg of their Champions League tie with the German giants. 
But Ballack believes that would be a big mistake on Wenger’s part and thinks Ozil will relish being involved in such a big match. 
‘Of course he has to play. He’s one of the best players at Arsenal,’ Ballack told BT Sport.
